weekly_top_story.headline: CMS launches Rural Health Transformation Program website with application details
weekly_top_story.summary: On September 3, 2025, CMS released a dedicated website for the Rural Health Transformation Program (RHTP), setting out strategic goals and application timelines that aim to improve healthcare quality in rural areas, with applications opening mid-September.

stories.headline: HHS announces increased enforcement action against healthcare information blocking
stories.summary: The Department of Health and Human Services declared a renewed enforcement focus on entities obstructing patient access to electronic health information, emphasizing adherence to existing information blocking rules to improve data flow and patient care.

stories.headline: European Health Data Space initiative to boost AI-driven healthcare innovation in the EU
stories.summary: The newly launched European Health Data Space will create the world's largest virtual healthcare database to facilitate cross-border health data sharing and foster AI-based healthcare tools development, aiming to enhance research and innovation by the end of 2028.
